mpipar

Class MPI_LoopNormalize

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.transforms.TransformPass
      • cetus.transforms.LoopTransformPass
        • mpipar.MPI_LoopNormalize

  • public class MPI_LoopNormalize
extends cetus.transforms.LoopTransformPass
    try to normalize all for loops add MPI normalized -- annotation to those normalized correctly which will be later used by the MPI_Analysis pass
